_explanations.ball_min_coverage: minimum percentage (as decimal) of its minEnclosingCircle a ball must cover.
_explanations.hsv_ranges: Array of dicts of {min: [], max: []}, one for each hsv range to be applied. Ranges will be taken from original image and compiled into one mask. THESE WILL VARY BETWEEN CAMERAS when used with video.
_explanations.img_resize: Dimensions to resize the image to (can be null to keep original size)
_explanations.subtract_canny: Bool, whether to use Canny and subtract the edges from the mask.
_explanations.notes: If a profile is missing any values, they will be filled in from default | Top level keys should be all lowercase
